alert.note: Alert for Clay; Quitman; Randolph (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 4:51PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Clay, western Randolph and Quitman Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 451 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Eufaula, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cuthbert, Georgetown, Wire Bridge, Bonapartes Retreat, Standleys Store, Watson Crossroads, Crossroads, Ricks Place, Pecan, Hatcher, Morris, Jones Crossing, Bethel, Benevolence, Springvale, Cotton Hill, Wades, Days Crossroads, Springvale Station and Zetto. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
